summary: The relationship between an aspiring dancer and a popular songstress provides a retrospective of the great African American entertainers of the early 1900s.
cast: Lena Horne|Bill Robinson|Cab Calloway and His Cotton Club Orchestra|Katherine Dunham and Her Troupe|Fats Waller|The Nicholas Brothers|Ada Brown|Dooley Wilson|Cab Calloway|Katherine Dunham|The Tramp Band|Doris Ake|Juliette Ball|Lucille Battle|Matthew 'Stymie' Beard|Talley Beatty|Lennie Bluett|Anise Boyer|Teddy Buckner|Judy Carol|Benny Carter|Janet Collins|Vivian Dandridge|Robert Felder|Louise Franklin|Ruby Golden|Suzette Harbin|Avanelle Harris|Kathleen Hartsfield|Maggie Hathaway|Charles Hawkins|Coleman Hawkins|Cleo Herndon|Johnny Horace|Illinois Jacquet|Mae E. Johnson|Jo Jones|Jeni Le Gon|Johnny Lee|Rosalie Lincoln|F.E. Miller|Taps Miller|Millie Monroe|Tommie Moore|Fayard Nicholas|Harold Nicholas|Florence O'Brien|Roger Ohardieno|Neva Peoples|Henry Phace Roberts|Ruth Scott|Zutty Singleton|Ned Stanfield|Nick Stewart|Johnny Thomas|Lena Torrence|Emmett 'Babe' Wallace|Ernest Whitman|Artie Young
director: Director: Andrew L. Stone (as Andrew Stone)
title: Stormy Weather
